rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for Blacksea enters the battlefield, copy the next spell you cast this turn that targets an opponent when you cast it.
rules_text2: {T}: Add {B} or {R}. When that mana is spent to cast a spell that targets an opponent, they lose 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent.
